title: Vlad has a horrible design
body:
[](http://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/landscape/vladimir-nosferatu.jpg)
He's obviously a vampire who likes blood, but he doesn't build {{item:3072}} or {{item:3174}}. What's next Riot? A helicopter that gets faster with boots?!

replies.body:
Upvoted for visibility. Riot really needs to change Vladimir into what he's always meant to have been: an autoattacking sustain mage who heals his allies with his kind ketchup magic.

Please save Vlad. 

#makevladgreatforonce
Explains why people keep feeding him. They always seem to be salty and play like a potato. Now I know their true desires are to be fries.

You sure you don't want to kill everybody with their own blood while you laugh maniacally whilst drinking said blood to get stronger?

Because I think that is the fantasy of most Vlad mains.
As a Vlad main, I can confirm that what Vlad players really want is ADC Soraka with ketchup because censorship.
Pray2Harambe4Vlad{{item:3070}}
Actually design of melee vlad who tears wounds of his enemies with claws and this way allows himself to drain the lifeforce out of the wounds would fit, wouldn't it.
Kinda sounds like warwick

I'm gonna need to point this out so no one else has to

Vlad isn't a vampire. Some of his skins might be though.
He's a hemomage.
Of course he's a vampire. Why else would he love blood? http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/925/494/218.png_large
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/ns12EI0vDpg/hqdefault.jpg
He's just a guy that likes to much punch
Periodmage
No, that makes him A Hemophiliac

uh, I think the term you are looking for is Hemomancer.  If you want to use mage, I would say Blood Mage.  I just don't like using Blood Mage because people get the wrong ideaand they think of Blood Mages who use their own blood to cast spells for cheaper or stronger.  Instead of actual blood manipulation.  Or if the person you are explaining him to is in to Avatar, just say he is a bloodbender, just a more mature badass version of it.

Yeah, I couldn't remember the term and Hemomancer sounds right....

But Huck knows well what he is, he's just trolling.
well all know vlad cant have real blood tencent said it was cherry kool-aid Kappa

{{champion:120}} Hecacopter that gets faster with boots?

Vlad does shit like that. Except he doesn't leave the blood in the body.
